name: Hexagon Ultra VR
description:
Immerse yourself in the strategic world of Hexagon Ultra, where hexagonal tiles set the stage for a thrilling clash between blue and red! Challenge your wits against an AI opponent, strategically moving your blue tiles to outmanoeuvre the enemy.

Rules: Command the blue tiles against the relentless red enemy. Strategically manipulate tiles to dominate the board and secure victory.
Move tiles to free neighbouring positions, initiating splits to create new tiles. Plan your moves wisely to shape the battlefield.
Jump over tiles, change colours strategically, and adapt your strategy as the game unfolds to secure dominance.

Victory Conditions: Fill the board with your tiles, outnumber the enemy, and emerge victorious. Watch as remaining positions succumb to the enemy colour if no moves are left.

Test your skills and experience the thrilling gameplay with 30+ levels.

Explore different environments and face off against unique enemy characters.

Stay tuned for updates, featuring new level packs, game modes, environments, and entertaining characters.

Hexagon Ultra is continuously evolving! Expect new game modes, environments, and characters to keep the excitement alive.
